Articles.Content:
I play a lot of games on steam, and one of them is Robocraft, which has some very interesting and fun-to-use Tank Tracks and my personal favourite: Walker legs, They are so fun to play with and are perfect for off-roading and exploration.... so, I know that there is a mod (infernal robotics) where you can create legs using multiple parts, but I thought hey, so many talented modern out there, and BahamutoD has already had a crack at it in BD Dynamics, and with the various parts in Kerbal Foundries, would there be any way for anyone to make legs in the game?

will happily help anyone interested

(I has mac by the way)
